  1. WildFly 17.0
  2. subsystem=infinispan
  3. cache-container
  4. cache

The configuration of the infinispan subsystem.

Runtime only resource This resource is runtime only and doesn't have any persistent configuration.

Children (1)

  • component A configuration component of a cache.
    • locking The locking configuration of the cache.
    • memory The configuration of the infinispan subsystem.
    • partition-handling The partition handling configuration for distributed and replicated caches.
    • persistence The configuration of the infinispan subsystem.
    • transaction The cache transaction configuration.

Attributes (20)

  • activations The number of cache node activations (bringing a node into memory from a cache store) . May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • average-read-time Average time (in ms) for cache reads. Includes hits and misses. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • average-replication-time The average time taken to replicate data around the cluster. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • average-write-time Average time (in ms) for cache writes. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • cache-status The status of the cache component. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type STRING
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • elapsed-time Time (in secs) since cache started. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • hit-ratio The hit/miss ratio for the cache (hits/hits+misses). May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type DOUBLE
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • hits The number of cache attribute hits. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • invalidations The number of cache invalidations. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • misses The number of cache attribute misses. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • number-of-entries The current number of entries in the cache. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type INT
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • passivations The number of cache node passivations (passivating a node from memory to a cache store). May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • read-write-ratio The read/write ratio of the cache ((hits+misses)/stores). May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type DOUBLE
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • remove-hits The number of cache attribute remove hits. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • remove-misses The number of cache attribute remove misses. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • replication-count The number of times data was replicated around the cluster. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • replication-failures The number of data replication failures. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • stores The number of cache attribute put operations. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • success-ratio The data replication success ratio (successes/successes+failures). May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type DOUBLE
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
  • time-since-reset Time (in secs) since cache statistics were reset. May return null if the cache is not started.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable true
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type read-only
